mapper.select: select resource.*, (case when teacher.t_name is null then admin.a_name else teacher.t_name end) as r_tname from resource left join teacher on teacher.t_id = resource.r_tid left join admin on admin.a_id = resource.r_tid
mapper.insert:
insert into resource( r_name, r_message, r_file_name, r_file_path, r_time, r_tid) values (#{r_name}, #{r_message}, #{r_file_name}, #{r_file_path}, now(), #{r_tid})
select last_insert_id()
